features: Fine Motor Games for Kids: Build fine motor skills with chunky, peg-shaped pieces that fit to the back of this friendly hedgehog. Also use Spike as for occupational therapy exercises
Colorful quills help kids build color recognition, sorting, and counting skills through fine motor skill games. Spike is also a great toy for visually impaired children!

Toddler Toys: Now fine motor intrinsic toys come with easy to grasp pieces that are just the right size for little toddler and preschool hands to hold. Fine motor set includes 2-piece hedgehog about 6” in diameter, 12 quills, and activity guide. EASY STORAGE: When playtime over the quills easily fit in the Hedgehog
Do not forget to explore our Spike the Hedgehog Collection to find engaging and educational options that promote long-lasting skills!

GIVE THE GIFT OF LEARNING: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift! Ideal gift for Halloween, Christmas, Stocking Stuffers, Easter Baskets Stuffers or even for Homeschool.

Super Smart Toddler Easter Basket Stuffers!: Whether they're learning with math games, hosting play food feasts, or building STEM and social-emotional learning skills, your kids will love our smart Easter basket stuffers and other Easter gifts for toddlers!
body.description: This Hedgehog lost his quills and only your little ones can help him get them back! Spike is a fine motor skills toy that helps kids build hand muscles and fine motor skills development as they replace the chunky, peg-shaped “quills” within the holes that dot the smiling hedgehog’s back. The learning doesn't end there—spike's colorful quills also lend themselves well to lessons in counting, sorting, and color identification skills. Kids can arrange quills by warm or cool colors, work on sequences and patterns by alternating colors, or count the quills with numbers printed on this fine motor toy for Toddlers. Once playtime is over, the Hedgehog is a snap to clean up—each piece is made of plastic that can be easily wiped clean, and the quills stow snugly inside the Hedgehog body.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SPIKE THE FINE MOTOR HEDGEHOG SPIKE THE FINE MOTOR HEDGEHOG PINK SPIKE PUZZLE PLAYMATE SPIKE SENSORY TREE HOUSE SPIKE RAINBOW STACKERS SPIKE FIDGET FRIEND Develops Kids build hands muscles, coordination, and fine motor skills every time they pop in or pull out Spike's colorful quills! Kids build hands muscles, coordination, and fine motor skills every time they pop in or pull out Spike's colorful quills! With this 2-in-1 puzzle and shape sorter, kids boost their critical thinking and fine motor skills one piece at a time! Build fine motor and sensory skills as you play hide and seek with this set's 5 colorful hedgehogs and their 5 unique textures! With 2 ways to stack, this colorful hedgehog helps kids build coordination and fine motor skills with the helpof colorful, tactile stacking cups! This friendly, fidget-ready hedgehog is ready to help little ones build sensory skills at home or on the go! Additional Skills 3-in-1 learning: master colors and numbers, plus preschool fine motor skill! 3-in-1 learning: master colors and numbers, plus preschool fine motor skill! 5-in-1 learning: master shapes, colors, numbers, plus preschool fine motor skills and logic! 5-in-1 learning: master shapes, colors, numbers, plus preschool fine motor and sensory skills! 5-in-1 learning: master colors, numbers, and shapes, plus fine motor and sensory skills! 6 ways to fidget: spin the wheel, turn the crank, press the button, twist the knob, pull the plunger, and move the switch! Ages 18 months and up 18 months and up 18 months and up 18 months and up 18 months and up 18 months and up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my 13 month old
reviews.reviewText: Spike the Fine Motor Hedgehog has been a delightful addition to our home, providing not only fun but also educational value for my little one. This toy is brilliantly designed to foster fine motor skills development, and it’s wonderful to see my child’s hand muscles strengthen as they play.The chunky, peg-shaped quills are perfect for small hands to grasp, making it an excellent toy for both toddlers and preschoolers. The vibrant colors of the quills are not just appealing; they serve as a fantastic tool for teaching color recognition, sorting, and counting. It’s been amazing to watch my child arrange the quills by warm or cool colors, create sequences and patterns, and count them as they play.Another aspect I appreciate about Spike is its use in occupational therapy exercises. It’s a great resource for parents and therapists looking for engaging ways to improve fine motor skills in children. Additionally, its suitability for visually impaired children highlights its inclusive design.Storage is a breeze with this toy. After playtime, the quills fit snugly inside the hedgehog’s body, making clean-up easy and keeping all pieces secure and organized. The plastic material is easy to clean, which is a must for any toy in a busy household.In conclusion, Spike the Fine Motor Hedgehog is more than just a toy; it’s a valuable educational tool that aids in the development of crucial skills while ensuring hours of fun. Its thoughtful design, educational benefits, and ease of storage make it a top choice for any parent looking to enrich their child’s playtime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddler
reviews.reviewText: Helps with fine motor skills and identifying different colors. Super fun for toddler, he loves how colorful and hilarious this is! (It doesn’t take much to entertain them lol)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The love my 1½ yr old has for Ms. Rachel led me to purchase this WONDERFUL!
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my young child (17 months) because every time she sees a specific scene of Ms Rachel counting and playing with Spike and helping him get his Quills back in, my baby laughs and laughs. hearing her giggle like that made me look up Spike online so she can have her very own hedgehog to help and play and I have the pleasure of hearing her laugh. Especially when she's got “Quilliam” out at the same time Ms Rachel has Spike out during that particular episode. She enjoys playing with Spikes brother “QUILLiam”... whether your child is a fan of Ms Rachel or not, it's a pretty great toy and babies find it captivating and are pretty intrigued by the colors, feel, and puzzle like quality. The ONLY thing I can say it lacks are extra quills ... I wish it came with an extra set of quills because baby girl has lost half of them already. That's why I rated the durability 3 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spike the Hedgehog: Fun and Educational Toy
reviews.reviewText: Learning Resources' Spike the Fine Motor Hedgehog is an amazing toy that combines fun and learning in one package. My daughter absolutely loves playing with it, and I'm thrilled with how it helps her develop her fine motor skills. The colorful quills are easy for little hands to grasp, and the pegs are a great way to practice sorting and counting. This toy is a definite winner in our household!
